title: This moba has by far , the worst report system in any created game
body:
I dont think i have ever seen so much toxic, but i can handle toxic.
LOL has ridicoous amount of afkers, i dont think ive ever seen any game that has so many afkers, but let afkers aside. players who ////////////intendedly die all game /////////// . im still shocked to see that players in this game litearlly join a game,and all what they do from the beginning is to die.
